title: einars1
author: einars1
created_time: April 20, 2023, 11:58:32 PMLast edit: April 21, 2023, 07:36:20 AM by einars1
content: No need anymore, have already found a solution outside the forum.

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Quote from: einars1 on April 20, 2023, 11:58:32 PMI need urgently a loan of 300 euro till May 10. Reason for my request is for family emergency.Prefer in BTC or bank transfer in Euro. I know i am new here and have only physical things for collateral what will be difficult online.What i offer to the person who can help out for the 20 days:- Full KYC and can do a video chat to see my passport and other documents you prefer to see.- Proof of income and work (working over 2 years for the same company)- Proof of addressI will repay the loan on May 10 + 20% interest.I only discuss here on forum, no invites to Telegram or other platforms.Also to clear things out, i am not a gambler and i have never scammed a single person in my whole life!No crypto collateral = No loan for newbies (especially if it's their first post).Physical goods might be stolen. Â Photographs of Documents can be forged.Quoteand i have never scammed a single person in my whole life!Now how many times have I heard that before I wonder?
